TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceContainer implements class System.IServiceProvider

span.span: Provides a container for services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務容器是，根據定義，服務提供者。A service container is, by definition, a service provider. 除了提供服務，它也提供一種機制來新增和移除服務。In addition to providing services, it also provides a mechanism for adding and removing services. 服務是.NET Framework 設計階段架構的基礎。Services are a foundation of the .NET Framework design-time architecture. 服務會提供設計階段物件存取特定功能和實作所提供的服務的服務物件的方法。Services provide design-time objects access to specific features and methods implemented by a service object that provides a service or services. 若要取得在設計階段的服務，請呼叫元件設置在設計模式的方法。To obtain a service at design time, call the method of a component sited in design mode. 設計工具和其他物件可以新增或移除服務，在設計階段透過介面。Designers and other objects can add or remove services at design time through the interface. 服務容器可以包含的其他服務的容器，以形成樹狀結構的服務容器中。Service containers can be contained by other service containers, forming a tree of service containers. 根據預設，介面會將服務新增至最接近的服務容器。By default, the interface adds services to the closest service container. 當加入服務時，則您可以新增指示，以將其升階。When a service is added, it can be added with instructions to promote it. 當升級服務時，它會新增至任何父服務容器上之前到達樹狀頂端的服務容器。When a service is promoted, it is added to any parent service container, on up until the top of the service container tree is reached. 這可讓設計工具提供的全域服務，可以使用此程序中的其他物件。This allows a designer to provide a global service that other objects in the process can use. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含的程式碼示範連結的服務容器的網路行為設定。The following code example contains the code for a that is configured to demonstrate the behavior of a network of linked service containers. [!code-cpp[IServiceContainerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IServiceContainerExample/CPP/serviceform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IServiceContainerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IServiceContainerExample/CS/serviceform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IServiceContainerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IServiceContainerExample/VB/serviceform.vb#1)]

summary.span: 加入特定服務至服務容器。

span.span: Adds the specified service to the service container.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddService (Type serviceType, System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback callback);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddService(class System.Type serviceType, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback callback) cil managed
Public Sub AddService (serviceType As Type, callback As ServiceCreatorCallback)
public: void AddService(Type ^ serviceType, System::ComponentModel::Design::ServiceCreatorCallback ^ callback);
abstract member AddService : Type * System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback -> unit

span.span: The type of service to add.

param.name: callback
param.span: 用於建立服務的回呼物件。

span.span: A callback object that is used to create the service.

param.span: 這個物件可以讓服務宣告為可用的，但是必須等到提出服務的要求時才會建立物件。

span.span: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays the creation of the object until the service is requested.

summary.span: 加入特定服務至服務容器。
